src_original: mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā,  prasādaṃ saṃjanayeyur,  bodhicittaṃ  cotpādayeyuḥ,  strībhāvaṃ ca vijugupsyeran,
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，十方無量不可思議諸佛世界，其有女人聞我名字，歡喜信樂，發菩提心，厭惡女身，壽終之後復為女像者，不取正覺。

src_original: mā tāvad aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃ-  budhyeyam.
tgt_original: 若不爾者，不取正覺。

src_original: 36. sacen me bhagavan bodhiprāptasya,  samantād daśasu  dikṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyācintyātulyāparimāṇeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu  ye bodhisattvā mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā,  praṇipatya  pañcamaṇḍalanamaskāreṇa vandiṣyante,
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，十方無量不可思議諸佛世界，諸天人民聞我名字，五體投地稽首作禮，歡喜信樂修菩薩行，諸天世人莫不致敬；

src_original: te bodhisattvacaryāṃ  caranto, na sadevakena lokena namasā satkṛtyeran, mā tāvad  aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam.  37. sacen me bhagavan bodhiprāptasya,
tgt_original: 若不爾者，不取正覺。 「『設我得佛，國中人天欲得衣服隨念即至，如佛所讚應法妙服自然在身；

src_original: kasyacid bodhisattvasya  cīvaradhāvanaśoṣaṇasīvanarajanakarma kartavyaṃ bhaven, P19
tgt_original: 若有裁縫、染治、浣濯者，不取正覺。

src_original: sahotpannāḥ sattvā naivaṃvidhaṃ sukhaṃ pratilabheraṃs,  tad yathāpi nāma niṣparidāhasyārhato bhikṣos tṛtīyadhyāna-  samāpannasya,
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，國中人天所受快樂不如漏盡比丘者，不取正覺。

src_original: mā tāvad aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim  abhisaṃbudhyeyam.  39. sacen me bhagavan bodhiprāptasya,  tatra buddhakṣetre  ye bodhisattvāḥ pratyajātās,  te yathārūpaṃ buddhakṣetra-  guṇālaṃkāravyūham ākāṃkṣeyus,  tathārūpaṃ nānā-  ratnavṛkṣebhyo na saṃjānīyur,
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，國中菩薩隨意欲見十方無量嚴淨佛土，應時如願，於寶樹中皆悉照見，猶如明鏡覩其面像；

src_original: mā tāvad aham anuttarāṃ  samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam.
tgt_original: 若不爾者，不取正覺。

src_original: 40. sacen me bhagavan bodhiprāptasya,  taṃ mama nāmadheyaṃ  śrutvānyabuddhakṣetropapannā bodhisattvā indriyabalavaikalpaṃ  nirgaccheyur,  mā tāvad aham anuttarāṃ
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，他方國土諸菩薩眾聞我名字，至于得佛，諸根缺陋不具足者，不取正覺。

src_original: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam.  41. sacen me bhagavan bodhiprāptasya,  tad-anyabuddhakṣetra-  sthā bodhisattvā mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā,  na suvibhaktavatīṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheran, yatra  samādhau sthitvā bodhisattvā ekakṣaṇavyatihāreṇāprameyā-
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，他方國土諸菩薩眾聞我名字，皆悉逮得清淨解脫三昧，住是三昧一發意頃，供養無量不可思議諸佛世尊而不失定意；

src_original: mama nāmadheyaṃ  śrutvā, tac-chravaṇasahagatena kuśalamūlena sattvā  nābhijātakulopapattiṃ pratilabheran,  yāvad bodhimaṇḍa-
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，他方國土諸菩薩眾聞我名字，壽終之後生尊貴家；

src_original: paryantaṃ, mā tāvad aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
tgt_original: 若不爾者，不取正覺。

src_original: abhisaṃbudhyeyam.  43. sacen me bhagavan bodhiprāptasya,  tad-anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu  ye sattvā mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā,  sahagatena kuśalamūlena yāvad bodhiparyantaṃ na  sarve bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ prītiprāmodyakuśalamūlasamavadhāna-
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，他方國土諸菩薩眾聞我名字，歡喜踊躍，修菩薩行，具足德本；

src_original: mā tāvad aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim  abhisaṃbudhyeyam.
tgt_original: 若不爾者，不取正覺。

src_original: 44. sacen me bhagavan bodhiprāptasya,  sahanāmadheya-  śravaṇāt tad-anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvā na samantānugataṃ  nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheran,  yatra sthitvā bodhisattvā  ekakṣaṇavyatihāreṇāprameyāsaṃkhyeyācintyāparimāṇān  buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvanti,
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，他方國土諸菩薩眾聞我名字，皆悉逮得普等三昧，住是三昧至于成佛，常見無量不可思議一切如來；

src_original: ākāṃkṣeyuḥ,  śrotum tathārupāṃ sahacittotpādān P21  na śṛṇuyur, mā tāvad aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
tgt_original: 若不爾者，不取正覺。

src_original: abhisaṃbudhyeyam  46. sacen me bhagavan bodhiprāptasya,  tatra buddhakṣetre  tad-anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye bodhisattvā mama nāmadheyaṃ
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，國中菩薩隨其志願，所欲聞法自然得聞；

src_original: śṛṇuyur, yas te sahanāmadheyaśravaṇān nāvaivarttikā  bhaveyur anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher,
tgt_original: 若不爾者，不取正覺。

src_original: mā tāvad aham  anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam.  47. sacen me bhagavan bodhiprāptasya,
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，他方國土諸菩薩眾聞我名字，不即得至不退轉者，不取正覺。

src_original: tatra buddhakṣetre  ye bodhisattvā mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyus,
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，他方國土諸菩薩眾聞我名字，不即得至第一、第二、第三法忍，於諸佛法不能即得不退轉者，不取正覺。
